root.name: Ford Racing 3
root.description: Ford Racing takes place across several US states, and players can use a plethora of different Ford cars. The different Fords are split up into different categories. These categories are :Vintage ClassicModernPerformanceOff Road In each of these categories, there are different Ford cars you must tackle driving. Here's a complete list :Car ListVintage1923 Model T Sedan1931 Model A RoadsterClassic1946 Convertible1949 (Car name was not added)1949 Coupe1955 Thunderbird1964 Galaxie 5001966 Thunderbird1966 Fairlane GT1968 Mustang1968 Mustang GT1970 Capri Mk I RS26001971 Mustang Mach I1972 Ranchero GT1973 KB Falcon GT1973 Mustang Mach I1975 Gran Torino SportPerformance1978 Capri Mk III 3.051994 Powerstroke Concept1999 Racing Puma2000 Mustang SVT Cobra R2001 FortyNine Concept2002 Crown Victoria2002 Focus SVT2002 Lightning SVT2002 Thunderbird Convertible2003 Falcon KR82003 Thunderbird Limited Edition2004 Mondeo ST2202004 Lightning SVT ConceptPerformance1971 GT70 Concept1987 Sierra Cosworth RS5001992 Mustang Mach III1992 Escort RS Cosworth1995 GT90 Concept1996 Indigo Concept1999 Mustang FR2002002 Taurus Stockcar2003 FR100 Concept2004 Mustang GTR Concept2005 Air Force Reserve Focus2005 Mustang GTOff Road1948 F11956 F-1001965 F-1001973 Escort RS20001998 F-150 4X41999 Focus Rally Car2001 Ex Concept2002 Explorer Sport Trac XLT2002 F-350 XLT Sport2004 F-150 FX4
